item.title: RA
item.description: Basic terminologies: Dimensions Facts Table and table naming conventions initial 3 letter prefix: DWH, ODS etc. Content: e.g. PRD, SLS Dimension or Fact: D, F Granularity : Department, day/week etc. Suffix as use case: Lookup vs Base Vs Aggregate vs Matrix Naming: data region + dimension_or_fact + content + granularity + usage Column naming: Naming: Attribute or measure + data type Attribute: Price etc. Data type: KEY, ID, DESC Maintenance columns: insert timestamp, update, close, close_dt Business calendar: 4-4-5 or 4-5-4 or 5-4-4 and 13 period calendar.

item.title: ODI
item.description: Full package for ETL Automation tool: UC4 RMS Server Database These work together; ODI isn’t standalone. All stuffs may be installed in the same RMS server. Jobs Handled by (ksh) scripts to run different jobs UC4 Scheduler Agent: defined in uc4 to connect to RMS server. defines path of scripts ODI agent Connect between server & ODI Can also automate UC4 tasks in newer versions. Architecture Design Mapping Transform Making of Project Operator Logging Status of jobs Topology Defining connections : physical and logical Physical connections ==> Mapped to logical connections Data model ==> Map table columns to table columns and so on.

item.title: Warehouse
item.description: Basic terminologies: Dimensions Facts Table and table naming conventions initial 3 letter prefix: DWH, ODS etc. Content: e.g. PRD, SLS Dimension or Fact: D, F Granularity : Department, day/week etc. Suffix as use case: Lookup vs Base Vs Aggregate vs Matrix Naming: data region + dimension_or_fact + content + granularity + usage Column naming: Naming: Attribute or measure + data type Attribute: Price etc. Data type: KEY, ID, DESC Maintenance columns: insert timestamp, update, close, close_dt

item.title: obiee
item.description: Steps Catalog –> Get to columns and filters. Change defaults tab to criteria save as give a proper name for result change all columns and filters as necessary. save again go to results then. export results. if > 2500 : export to csv. Edit the sheet RMS Sales recon Tran data In tran_data we have item, units, tran_code as major fields. if it belongs to a pack, then it has a ref_pack_no which is a packitem object.
